dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1545 EH: VA Prescription Data Accountability Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the authority of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to disclose certain patient information to State controlled substance monitoring programs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the VA Prescription Data Accountability Act 2017.

section.header: Secretary of Veterans Affairs disclosure of patient information to State controlled substance monitoring programs
section.text: Section 5701(l) of title 38, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking a veteran or the dependent of a veteran and inserting a covered individual; and
by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

In this subsection, a covered individual is an individual who is dispensed medication prescribed by an employee of the Department or by a non-Department provider authorized to prescribe such medication by the Department.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives May 23, 2017.
